title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.4 - Orders of the superintendent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.4 - Orders of the superintendent

State Regulations

The power of the superintendent to issue an order to appear
and explain an apparent violation, to discontinue unauthorized or unsafe
practices and to keep books and accounts as prescribed, as set forth in Banking

Law, section 39(1), (2) and (5), shall apply to any mutual trust investment
company with the same force and effect as if mutual trust investment companies
were specifically mentioned in each such subdivision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
50.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
